data.text: Nyithinde nobed joma roteke e piny;
Pith gi mwandu yudore e ode,
Ngʼama ngimane oriere ler rienyne kata gotieno, ngʼat mangʼwon,
Ngʼama ngʼwon ma holo ji gige gi chuny maler biro neno ber
Chunye ok chandre kendo oonge gi luoro moro amora;
Gisepogo gigegi ne joma odhier, bergi osiko nyaka chiengʼ;
Ngʼama timbene richo biro nene mi iye wangʼ,
